funcs.initialDialogue: async function initialDialogue() { const at='center';  for (let [main, ...others] of level.initialDialogue) others.forEach(w => api.window(w, [Math.random(), Math.random()], 32)), await api.window(main, at, 32, 0) }
funcs.makeMainActorAfraid: function makeMainActorAfraid() { Object.assign(level.actors.pointer1, {emit:'red'}), api.write('pointer1'), setTimeout(() => {if (L === level) Object.assign(level.actors.pointer1, {dhealth:{Bg:-10, Bb:-10}, dscore:{Br:.02}}), api.write('pointer1')}, 1000) }
funcs.makeItEasier: function makeItEasier() { level.winScore -= 2 * (api._x2_4_enters = api._x2_4_enters+1||0) | 0;  level.winScore <= 100 && (level.winScore = 100, level.stages.normalWalkers = level.stages.rarerWalkers) }
funcs.main: async function main() { makeItEasier(), await initialDialogue(), makeMainActorAfraid(), stage('normalWalkers') }

onLoad: let s='';    for (let k in level.funcs) s += 'const '+k+'=level.funcs.'+k+'='+level.funcs[k]+'\n';    new Function('L', s+'\nreturn main()')(level)
onLost:
Object.assign(level, level.stages[Math.random()*2|0 ? 'defeat1' : 'defeat2']), api.write();  api.window([`(LOST)`, `(This world is unforgiving.)`, `(Here is some helpful advice:
 don't get hit by the walkers.)`, `(See how they move?
 Master their movement.)`, `(Come on, you can do it.)`, `(I believe in you.)`, `(Learn.)`, `(Learning is good.
 Difficulty is learning, and learning is good.)`, `(Come on, you can do it.)`, `(I believe in you.)`, `(Learn.)`, `(Learning is good.
 Difficulty is learning, and learning is good.)`, `(You are small, but not helpless.
 Your mind is your greatest weapon.
 Stop walking into the walkers.)`, `(Okay, I'll just loop my words now.)`][(api._x2_3 = api._x2_3+1||0) % 14], 'pointer1', 32).then(() => api.levelLoad())
